title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that makes it trivial to pull, run, and manage large language models locally.
highlights: pull & run Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async wrapper for the Ollama API; install via PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK published on npm for browser, Node, and Bun.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a chat, LLM, and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-user support, file uploads, and RAG.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for document Q&A.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client with conversation history, markdown rendering, and model switcher.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate (crates.io) for Ollama with Tokio and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with NuGet package.

title: ollama-gpt-crawler
summary: Crawl websites and generate Q&A pairs using Ollama models for fine-tuning datasets.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models into channels with DM support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells for macOS & Linux.
